author: Tawnell D. Hobbs
title: Latest in School Supplies: Bulletproof Plates for Backpacks
text:
Schools and parents seeking ways to blunt the impact of mass shootings are investing in safe rooms to shelter students, backpacks with bullet-stopping panels and whiteboards that double as bulletproof shields.
Security experts say putting schools on lockdown, already widely practiced, is the most effective response to shooters like the gunman who killed 17 on Feb. 14 at a high school in Parkland, Fla. But that isnâ€™t stopping the search for products that might provide a protective edge.
...
